#Text= Driver says : " I , uh , got a delivery to make at Bao Yu .

column1: #Text=I should be back later today .
#Text=" Officer says : " You all right ?
#Text=" Driver says : " Yeah , just a little tired .
#Text=One more pick - up , then I 'm clocking out .
#Text=" Officer says : " I thought you said you had a delivery ?
#Text=" Driver says : " Did I ?
#Text=" Officer says : " I 'm going to need you to step out of the vehicle and open the back of the truck .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Let 's get out of here !
#Text=" Opal says : " Hey , Bolin .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Opal !
#Text=Oh , wow , you ... really know how to sneak up on someone .
#Text=" Opal says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh nothing , you know , just ... just thinking about my body and mustaches that I might have in the future .
#Text=" Opal says : " You 're acting weird again .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Sorry .
#Text=I was n't really thinking about all my mustaches .
#Text=I 'm just frustrated .
#Text=I 've been trying to metalbend and I ca n't figure it out .
#Text=Do n't tell anyone , okay ?
#Text=" Opal says : " Why not ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Because it 's embarrassing .
#Text=This is n't the first time I 've tried , and I 've been wanting to metalbend ever since I heard about Toph .
#Text=Your grandmother is my biggest hero !
#Text=" Opal says : " My mom grew up learning from Toph .
#Text=Just go train with her .
#Text=Stop being so scared .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You know what ?
#Text=Maybe I am scared .
#Text=But what about you ?
#Text=I know that you want to go to the Northern Air Temple to train with Tenzin , but you have n't done it , because you 're afraid too !
#Text=" Opal says : " You know what ?
#Text=You 're right .
#Text=I do n't want to leave my family and disappoint my mom .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Look at us !
#Text=Talking about our feelings , supporting each other .
#Text=" Opal says : " It 's nice .
#Text=" Toph says : " What were you thinking ?
#Text=And what were you thinking ?
#Text=You two have put me in an impossible position .
#Text=" Lin says : " You 're mad at me ?
#Text=She 's the one who was running around with criminals !
#Text=" Suyin says : " This is all your fault !
#Text=" Lin says : " I was doing my job !
#Text=" Toph says : " All right , enough !
#Text=Here 's what we 're going to do .
#Text=Su , you need to leave the city as soon as possible .
#Text=" Suyin says : " What ?!
#Text=Where am I supposed to go ?
#Text=" Toph says : " You 'll go stay with your grandparents .
#Text=Lin , give me the arrest report .
#Text=" Lin says : " Mom , what are you doing ?!
#Text=You ca n't cover this up !
#Text=There are witnesses .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm the Chief of Police !
#Text=I ca n't have a daughter in jail !
#Text=" Lin says : " So , once again , Suyin gets to do whatever she wants and there are no consequences .
#Text=" Toph says : " This is our only option .
#Text=" Guo says : " You 're going to feel a bit fragile , so it 's probably best if you take it easy for a while .
#Text=" Lin says : " I do n't need to rest .
#Text=I need to do something I should 've done a long time ago .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Congratulations .
#Text=You 're the first metalbending Avatar .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , umm , I 've been thinking , and I 'd like to try to learn metalbending .
#Text=I mean , I 'm sure you have a waiting list or something of a couple years so .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Let 's get started .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I think Lin is mad about something .
#Text=" Lin says : " Su , it 's time we talk .
#Text=" Suyin says : " After thirty years , you 're finally ready to talk ?
#Text=" Lin says : " When we were in Mom 's office that day , you could 've taken responsibility for what you did .
#Text=But instead , you stayed quiet and let Mom throw her whole career away .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Mom did n't throw her career away .
#Text=She retired the next year .
#Text=She was a hero .
#Text=" Lin says : " You think she wanted to retire ?
#Text=She was so guilt - ridden about what she did to protect you that she did n't feel worthy of her badge .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Look , I admit that I was not a perfect kid and I 've made some mistakes in the past but - " Lin says : " You made some mistakes ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Lin , Mom and I already talked about this years ago and worked things out .
#Text=If you had gotten together with us like we 'd asked , you would know that I 'm a different person now .
#Text=I 've been a different person for a long time .
#Text=" Lin says : " You think that just because you live in a big , fancy house , and have a chef who cooks you fancy food , that you 're a different person ?
#Text=Maybe you could fool everyone else , but you ca n't fool me .
#Text=I see right through you .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You know what , Lin ?
#Text=You 're the one who has n't changed .
#Text=You 're still a bitter loner who only cares about herself .
#Text=No wonder Tenzin ended things with you years ago .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Okay , I guess this is how it 's going to be .
#Text=" Korra says : " Should I stop them ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " You do n't have any siblings , fighting is all part of the healing process .
#Text=" Wei says : " Go Mom !
#Text=" Huan says : " My sculpture !
#Text=Actually , it looks ... kinda better now .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You 've got it out of your system ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Not quite yet !
#Text=" Opal says : " What are you two doing ?!
#Text=You 're sisters !
#Text=Why would you want to hurt each other ?
#Text="
